comment: Absolutely love this feedback system! It's incredibly intuitive and has helped us organize customer suggestions so much better. The roadmap view is particularly useful for planning our development cycles.
Great tool overall. The voting system works well and the interface is clean. Would love to see more integration options with other project management tools we use.
This platform has transformed how we handle customer feedback. The drag-and-drop roadmap feature is amazing, and our team loves how easy it is to track idea progress from submission to completion.
Good functionality but the mobile app could use some improvements. Sometimes it's slow to load and the interface isn't as responsive as the desktop version.
Excellent customer support and the platform keeps getting better with each update. The recent dashboard improvements have made it even more useful for our product team.
Very satisfied with the features and ease of use. The commenting system is great for team collaboration. Only minor issue is that export functionality could be more robust.
While the concept is good, we've experienced some bugs with the voting system. Votes sometimes don't register properly, and we've had to refresh the page multiple times.
Perfect solution for managing product feedback! The activity feed keeps everyone updated, and the status management system helps us communicate progress to stakeholders effectively.
Really appreciate the clean design and user-friendly interface. The search functionality is powerful and makes finding specific feedback much easier than our previous solution.
Decent platform with good basic features. However, we need more customization options for our specific workflow. The current templates are a bit limiting for our use case.
